summary: A test suite that sets up dummy components and inputs to verify the behavior of the Stable Diffusion ControlNet pipeline with Prompt Attention Guidance (PAG), covering configuration, enable/disable toggles, and unconditional generation.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the functionality of the AI image generation pipeline that combines ControlNet and PAG, ensuring correct handling of configuration options and stable performance for endâ€‘user products.
